Everyone, have you read
the books I gave you, mo?

rows.label: tlk4210018302_msg0002
rows.name:
Martis is the old man, Kazuna
is the Kapiba, and Kukuri
is the Divine Beast...

Please present your feelings on
becoming the people in the book, mo!
